Articles.Content:
Where is the property on rover wheels saying like max speed or max torque in cfg file. I am modifying a wheel

- - - Updated - - -

Someone?

where are people

Edited July 6, 2015 by 322997am

A: These types of questions go in the Modding Support forum, or at least the Gameplay Questions forum, so you're actually limiting your opportunity to get answers here.

B: It's been 20 minutes. Have some patience.

C: You should be able to find those bits yourself pretty easily if you just open the .cfg in a text editor and use ye olde ctrl+F search function to dig up lines that look promising. That's what I generally do.
Moved to addons where addon dev types will see it and chime in.
